name: Perl: Avoid too many Functions in a single Program
description: Programs should have less than X Functions The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists all the Programs having more than X Functions. It provides the following information: Program full name, number of Functions
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, Programs should not have too many Functions
remediation: Review the Program design to reduce the number of Functions
